channel.title: Vps information
channel.description:
alright. so im getting to the point now on my server (will not name due to advertisements) where i need a vps. but dont know where the best deal would be for me to get one nor' do i know how to work one.
so im here to ask can anyone here who may have used them b4 in their past or is currently using one
(FOR WINDOWS) wehre they bought theirs, and how to use them to put my server online.
thanks, ike

item.title: Vps information
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well. You have to make sure you have Java on the VPS, and you also have to open the server port. Which is as easy as opening 43594 in Windows Firewall. Once you have Java and you have the port open. Make your run.bat look something like this

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m Server cls

the jre6 can be whatever kind of java you download.

Theres also a guide here.

Read full topic
